Name: Zubway
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Chop watermelon and MUDDLE in base of shaker with raspberries. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Few ingredients, but loads of flavour.
History: Created in 1999 by Jamie Terrell, London, England.
